name: Embedding
description: This module give an tool integrators and easy way to embed Maven.

name: FDPFC
description: Features dependent on POM Format Changes

name: Multiple Language Support
description: holds references to issues that deal with integrating non-Java support into Maven, such as .Net and C/C++

name: Plugin Requests
description: Ideas for new plugins whether they be ones that existed in m1 or plugins that pertain to m2 itself. Ideas can be started here so everyone can have access and then they can be moved to the plugin matrix.
